title: Integrating Metarhizium anisopliae entomopathogenic fungi with border cropping reduces black bean aphids (Aphis fabae) damage and enhances yield and quality of French bean
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Anthony Emaru, Jane G. Nyaanga, Mwanarusi Saidi
